features: Eyeliner Crayon: This blendable radiant eyeliner crayon is a total triple threat; Use your Jumbo Eyeliner Pencil as a creamy eyeshadow, eyeliner and highlighter; Apply it to your water lines, inner corners and entire eye lid for a pop of intense color

Smooth and Versatile: This creamy eye liner pencil glides on effortlessly, no pulling, tugging or fading; Apply it as an eyeshadow, highlighter, or eyeliner and choose from a rainbow of vivid hues in multiple finishes from matte to metallic

All Eyes On Eye Makeup: Complete your look with our full range of eye makeup products ranging from eyeshadow palettes to false eyelashes, eyeliners, concealers, setting sprays, eyebrow makeup, eyeshadow primer and more

Cruelty Free Cosmetics: We believe animals belong in our arms, not in a lab; All of our makeup is certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty free brand; We don't test any of our products on animals

Discover NYX Professional Makeup: Try all of our professional makeup products today from eyeshadow, eyeliner, and false lashes to liquid lipstick, lip gloss, primer, concealer, setting sprays and eyebrow makeup
body.description: A radiant eyeliner that also doubles as an eyeshadow. Made with a blend of mineral oil and powder, our creamy Jumbo Eye Pencils glide on effortlessly-no pulling, tugging or fading-and come in a rainbow of vivid hues. Our most voluptuous pencil yet! Our Jumbo Eye Pencils can be sharpened with a sharpener that has an opening for a large pencil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this pencil and it has great color. It makes applying eyeshadow so much easier and is worth it. The price is unbeatable for the pigment. The only downside is that you can't twist it up or sharpen it so it does run out fast but a little goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Strong Eyeliner So Easy to Apply!
reviews.reviewText: I've always used white eyeliner on my lower lash line - I started doing that way back when white eyeliner was the thing. (Ok, yes - I've been wearing makeup since the late '80s. Well that was an instant downer! lol) I can't wear mascara on my lower lashes because it slides right off and onto the delicate skin under my eyes...and usually won't budge after that, making my eyes look heavy and dark for the rest of the day. Using a light application of white eyeliner RightUpUnder my lower lashes makes my eyes look wider and brighter. (I still don't wear mascara on my lower lashes.) I had a hard time finding it after the popularity of white makeup waned in the early '90s, so I resigned myself to carefully using a small amount of white eye shadow under there for the longest time. I was never very happy with those results - it was rough getting the shadow under the lashes without winding up with spatters of it under my eyes, creating shiny patches where I put concealer - something you don't want. It was difficult finding the right white shadow - any sort of sparkle or frost looked...goofy. So when I saw this NYX Jumbo Eye Pencil Shadow Liner in Milk, I almost had a coronary.This is AWESOME! It goes on smooth and doesn't tug or skip. It is very easy to blend with a cotton bud and it's just the right shade of white. It lasts all day with one application, making touch-ups a thing of the past. It's nice and thick, which means this will last forever. I also usually wear a small dab of white shadow in the inner corners of my eyes - that trick also helps make the eyes look wide, bright, and alert. This doubles for that purpose, cutting down on the amount of junk I have to buy and carry. I also don't have to worry about this falling apart in my makeup bag, like eye shadows can when you travel or aren't real gentle with your purse. I've been using this for about a month and I haven't even had to sharpen it to expose more creamy liner yet - a nod to how well the color lays down. I have some eyeliners that I have to sharpen almost daily, since it seems to take a ton to make any color show up. That isn't the case with this!This is listed as an "Eye Pencil" - and it is a pencil shape. However, when I think of a pencil eyeliner, I think of a Kohl pencil - they are usually soft, easily smeared, and seem to break a lot. This eyeliner is not like that at all! It is a rich, creamy formula - totally different than what I've experienced with other "Eye Pencils". I just wanted to throw that out there in case you are hesitating to purchase this because of the issues you've had with "Eye Pencils" in the past. This is so easy to draw on right from the pencil - draw the line, smudge with a cotton bud, look gorgeous. Simple! Other than using this pencil in the inner corners of my eyes, I haven't really tried it as a shadow - so I can't speak to how well they work/don't work in that capacity. I know it lasts all day in my eye corners - and I have to say that if I don't quickly blend it after a quick swipe by my nose, I can't move this eyeliner...AT ALL. (I'm finding that to be the case with all the new "gel" eyeliners - which isn't a complaint, just an observation.) I can say that it absolutely rocks as a sweat-proof, rub-proof, blink-proof, run-into-an-ex-boyfriend-proof, long-day-proof eyeliner. I LOVE IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to apply
reviews.reviewText: It is soft and very easy to put on and gives a nice shine to make your eyes pop. However you can't twist it out more so it runs out pretty fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars eye makeup essential
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this to apply to my bottom waterline and it does the job great! Adding the white liner to the bottom waterline helps make your eyes pop! I would like it if it had the twist function so that more can come out and be used but it lasts almost all day if you don't cry obviously and is easily applied! It has a great, strong color too! I would recommend if you need a white liner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and looks great
reviews.reviewText: Easy, quick, and. has plenty of staying power. It doesn’t smear or come off until you’re ready to take it off. Rich color. I put it on and never worry about it smearing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars pretty colors, no staying power, makes my eyes feel wierd
reviews.reviewText: This review is for "Cottage Cheese", which is a shimmery white.About me: 40 something, barely emerging fine lines (so far so good!), dry, rosacea prone skin. Sensitive eyes. Dark hair, dark eyes, fair skin (alabaster).I love jumbo eye pencils. I think they are great way to add some color- whether all over lid, or as an eye liner. Creamy eye pencils just make it easy to quickly apply some color without spending much time doing so. I love the creamy aspect to jumbo eye pencils, and I find that they rarely irritate my sensitive eyes. I usually use 100% Pure brand for creamy eye pencils, but they have done away with them. So I have been trying out different brands as I find them. I bought a few colors from this collection, as the add on price made it easy and budget friendly to do so.I love white or super light eye color. My skin is fair, cool, and slightly pink. This is a great color if you like a very soft, shimmery white. It adds just a little shimmer with a hint of white. I thought it was going to be my go-to cream pencil as I really like to just take a quick swipe of white to my lids to perk them up before heading out the door. The color is nice, but it doesn't quite stand out, like it is almost similar to my skin tone. I have applied it directly to my skin, and I have used it with a primer and powder. I'd say it definitely needs the latter for staying power.Sadly, the product makes my eyes feel weird after a short period of time. Kinda tired feeling, kinda itchy.. meh.While application is creamy, it does tug a little on the skin. I find myself applying it then smoothing it out with my finger as gently as possible. It doesn't apply strong enough to create a visible line. So if you wanted to use it as a defined eye liner, you may not be successful in doing so. I also have a darker color which I use this for, and it really just applies a soft sweep of color rather than a line. I think these are best as an eyes shadow, or as a highlighter.As for container.. so once you get through the exposed product, you can only reach more of it by sharpening it. It really could have a turn base to move product up rather than people having to use a large sharpener to cut away at the hard casing. Sharpening is fine if the material around the product is conducive to easy sharpening without losing integrity of product or patience of user. This material is not a great choice for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very cute, must have!
reviews.reviewText: its a great addition to any makeup look, popping into the inner corner or tip of the nose. the color stays on all day and its nice and bright. have had for over a year now and still havent used it all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this color its so pretty and I’m totally buying more and also its worth it the price is so reasonable than the specific stores
I was skeptical this wasn’t going to be the legit product and to my surprise it was. Blends good, very opaque. It’s a great product and cheaper on Amazon than anywhere in stores!
Ideal para maquillaje de fantasía donde el blanco se usa para dar acento y luces en todo el rostro.

El color es igual al de la imagen, cremoso y de una duración buena, si tienes párpado graso es probable que al paso de las horas se corra un poco, yo lo sello con un poquito de sombra y me aguanta bien todo el día. Tiene una textura media y es fácil de difuminar con el dedo recién aplicado, una vez que se seca ya es más difícil de mover.
Très belle couleur…et très facile à utiliser
Nice to line your lower eye not has stark has white
